title: Statistical Validation and Methodological Critique
content: Comprehensive statistical analysis of numerical pattern significance and identification of methodological limitations
formulas: Binomial test: p=0.0196 (k=5 successes, n=9 trials, p_null=0.2)
p-value sensitivity: significant at p_null ≤ 0.2, not at p_null ≥ 0.3
gems: Confirmation bias in selective pattern interpretation
Cultural numerology explains 7's prevalence over dimensional projections
Miller's magical number seven as cognitive limit in memory and judgment
Need for statistical controls and larger datasets for validation
validation: Rigorous application of binomial tests and sensitivity analysis reveals borderline significance
source: Technical report on pattern validation and statistical critique
